levelList.name: Regret
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count

levelList.name: Regret
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Burst Tremor
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Burst Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised

levelList.name: Regret
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 2 random removable negative effects applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +3 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Burst Tremor
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Burst Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (12 + 3x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised.

levelList.name: Regret
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has a negative status effect, Atk Weight +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Burst Tremor.
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by Burst Tremor increases by 30% of Tremor on target.
Reduce Tremor Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gain 3 Bind and 1 Blunt Power Up next turn.
